meanings.definition: A small, square doughnut covered in powdered sugar.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat beignets for breakfast on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells delicious beignets.
meanings.sent3: When I tried to juggle beignets, powdered sugar went everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a beignet covered in powdered sugar.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked beignets filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A fried pastry made from choux pastry.
meanings.sent1: The beignets at the fair were crispy and delicious.
meanings.sent2: My grandma's recipe for beignets is a family favorite.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the beignets were tiny pillows and took a nap on them.
meanings.sent4: The beignets melted in my mouth like butter on a hot pan.
meanings.sent5: The chef's specialty was golden-brown beignets made from choux pastry.
